correctness.rationale: Some core items match the article (ZnO by thermal ALD on ISM in a Savannah 100; DEZ/H2O chemistry; ~500 cycles; ~55 nm film; Ar present), but many fields are incorrect, untraceable, or schema-violating. Specific issues: (1) Schema violation: processParameters.plasmaPower is set to null (should be omitted or a valid object). (2) Dosing/purge times are wrong in both values and units: the article (Table 1) indicates for ZnO DEZ pulse/exposure/purge ≈ 0.1 s/5 s/15 s and H2O 1.5 s/15 s/150 s; extraction uses 1.3 ms and 1.5 ms dosing and 30 ms/15 ms purges, and the precursor pulse value (1.3) is incorrect for ZnO. If unit must be MilliSEC per schema, convert seconds to ms (e.g., 100 ms, 1500 ms, 15000 ms, 150000 ms) and correct the numeric values. (3) Growth-per-cycle is inconsistent: set to 0.2 Å/cycle, but 55 nm/500 cycles ≈ 1.1 Å/cycle from the article. (4) Pressure: 0.01 (MilliM_HG) appears taken from the pre-drying vacuum (1×10^-2 Torr) rather than a reported deposition pressure; deposition pressure is not given. (5) Flow rates: precursorFlow and coReactantFlow of 20 sccm are not reported; only Ar 20 sccm is mentioned for the pre-dry. These should not be guessed. (6) Numerous material/device properties are fabricated and not traceable to the paper: refractive index, absorption coefficient/method, resistivity, carrier density, mobility, uniformity %, conformality aspect ratio, XPS composition/ratio, AFM roughness, XRR density, and TFT metrics. Only crystallinity (polycrystalline by XRD) is supported. (7) saturation and nucleationPeriod are guessed (not reported). To correct: remove or justify unsupported fields; fix dosing/purge times and units; revise GPC to ~1.1 Å/cycle; avoid assigning unreported flow rates and device/optical/electrical/AFM/XPS/XRR values; omit plasmaPower or provide a valid object if PEALD were used (it was not).

completeness.rationale: Largely incomplete and weakly grounded. Only one ZnO ALD process at 100 °C is extracted, while the article reports multiple ZnO processes at 70, 100, 125, 200, 275, and 300 °C (all 500 cycles, ~55 nm). Several parameters are fabricated or inconsistent with the text: dosing/purge times are given in milliseconds with wrong magnitudes (table provides seconds; values should be converted correctly per schema), growth-per-cycle (0.2 Å), saturation, and nucleation period are not reported; precursor/co-reactant flow rates (20 sccm) are not provided in the paper (only Ar 20 sccm during drying is stated); the pressure used corresponds to a drying step (1×10⁻² Torr) and is not confirmed for deposition. Many material and device properties (refractive index, absorption, electrical properties, uniformity, conformality, composition, roughness, density, TFT metrics) are not measured in the article, thus not traceable. Schema issues are present (plasmaPower set to null; extra filmThickness at processParameters level; supercycleDesign provided though not applicable). Correct items include ALD system (Savannah 100, Cambridge Nanotech), chemistry (DEZ/H2O), substrate (ISM), cycles (500), and film thickness (~55 nm), and crystallinity (polycrystalline at 100 °C). To improve: (1) add separate processes for each ZnO deposition temperature reported; (2) correct dosing/purge times using Table 1 and proper unit conversion; (3) restrict flow information to Ar purge (20 sccm) if applicable and remove unreported precursor/co-reactant flows; (4) do not assume deposition pressure from drying; (5) remove unreported GPC, saturation, nucleation, optical/electrical/uniformity/composition/roughness/density/device metrics; (6) remove plasmaPower and supercycleDesign for TALD; (7) consider including the pre-drying step explicitly if the schema allows. Overall, many fields are untraceable or incorrect, and multiple processes are missing.
